page.title: 05 A MARKET GARDENER-WEST ROW
page.content: MARKET GARDENING IS MY LIVING.I GROW SOME VEGETABLES BUT MAINLY FLOWERS.MY FAVOURITE FLOWERS ARE CHRYSANTHEMUMS - WE GROW 32 VARIETIES - BUT SCABIOUS ARE OUR MOST PROFITABLE LINE. OUR BUSIEST TIMES ARE FROM JUNE TILL SEPTEMBER WHEN OUR WORKING DAY CAN LAST FROM 7.30a.m. TILL 9p.m. AT CHRISTMAS, WHEN THE CHRYSANTHEMUMS FINISH, WE HAVE A HOLIDAY. THEN IN JANUARY WE BEGIN PLANTING SEEDS IN THE GREENHOUSES. I SELL FLOWERS TO SOME LOCAL SHOPS BUT MOST OF OUR OUTPUT GOES TO COVENT GARDEN.EVERY EVENING OUR FLOWERS PACKED IN BOXES ARE TAKEN BY LORRY TO LONDON. MY WIFE AND I LOVE OUR JOB. WE MAKE A GOOD LIVING THOUGH WE WILL NEVER BE RICH.WE SOMETIMES HAVE PROBLEMS WITH PESTS, HIGH WINDS AND BAD BACKS BUT THOSE GO WITH THE JOB!
